column4: Sony DRU835 Int. 18X w/ LightScribe <--- is this supported in ubuntu?
I've seen no linux software to do lightscribe.. there could be some now.. but wasn't before
: do u think Sony DRU835 Int. 18X is supported?
I'm sure the drive should work fine
that just means you won't be able to burn lightscribe labels
the drive itself will still work
